At Westinghouse, we recognize that our employees are our most valuable asset, and we seek to identify, attract and recruit the most qualified talent while recognizing and encouraging the value of diversity in the global workplace. About the role: As a Document Management Solutions intern, you will provide support for the business, participate in all levels of the software development lifecycle, and perform system administration functions on document management applications). You will report to the Information and Document Management Solutions Manager and be located at our Cranberry location. This is a paid, full-time, hybrid summer position. Key Responsibilities: Provide server and client support for the document management application by being an initial contact for all support related issues and concerns from internal and external end-users Administer all of our user account requests following Westinghouse standards and controls Design and implement complex queries and procedures to meet customer reporting and automation requests Collaborate with Application and Infrastructure teams for adherence to best practices and process standardization Contribute to, develop, and maintain core Java application frameworks, APIs, and data structures Qualifications: Pursuing a bachelor's degree in information technology, computer science, or software Engineering Minimum GPA of 3.0 Completed Sophomore year of college Experience working with Oracle and SQL environments Working knowledge of both Linux and Windows, including scripting Experience with Apache No relocation assistance provided We are committed to transparency and equity in all of our people practices. The hourly rate for this position, which is dependent upon experience, qualifications and skills, is estimated to be $22.69 to $27.50 per hour. #LI-Hybrid, #LI-Nuclear, #LI-Engineering, #LI-Internship Why Westinghouse? Westinghouse Electric Company is the global nuclear energy industry's first choice for safe, clean, and efficient energy solutions. We enable our delivery of this vision by living our value system: Safety and Quality Integrity and Trust Customer Focus and Innovation Speed and Passion to Win Teamwork and Accountability While our Global Headquarters are located in Cranberry Township, PA, we have over 11,000 employees working at locations in 19 different countries.
